column1: Simulation should be updated through the task_based_updater (task) or log_based_updater (log)
Start ACT-R from txt2actr (i), externally (e) or via docker web interface (dw)
Filename and relative path of data or task specification (from the folder in which meta_info.csv is)
Filename and relative path of cognitive model specifications
Filename and relative path of cognitive model
Filename and relative path of windows specification
Filename and relative path of buttons specification
Filename and relative path of images specification
Filename and relative path of windows label mapping
Filename and relative path of sounds label mapping
Filename and relative path of any outputs (in case results should not appear in )
Column separator (if semicolon (leave empty))
Starting time (in seconds) at which first event/ item should be scheduled (default 1)
Sampling rate in hz (log based updating) or time interval in msec between presented items (task based updating)
Skip rate in log file in rows
Column start idx in dataset
Row start idx in dataset
show environment windows
show display labels (only has effect if 'show environment windows is 'yes')
Number of decimal in values (default 2)
time interval to new value in msc (default 1)
simulate with human interaction
Time to run simulation in seconds (default 1000, if dependent on length of log file, write 0)
Run actr simulation full time (if no, simulation might end before if no events to process)
Run actr simulation real time
Suppress console output (default no)
Filename and relative path of console output
